event.title: enjoys mild weather throughout the year, except for some remarkably chilly mornings

data.event: San Gregorio enjoys mild weather throughout the year, except for some remarkably chilly mornings, even in the summer.
Most of the rainfall falls from November through April.

event.title: 1983 when 57.86 inches (146.96 cm) of rain fell

data.event: The wettest year on record was 1983 when 57.86 inches (146.96 cm) of rain fell.

event.title: fell in San Gregorio on January 21, 1962

data.event: Although snow is very rare in the coastal lowlands, 4.0 inches (10 cm) fell in San Gregorio on January 21, 1962.
